markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1525) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 89 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your tumbling catches your foe off guard. When you [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) successfully, the foe you Tumbled Through is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the next attack you make before the end of your turn.
name: Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler)
